product_name: BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter - Fits Graco Seats
long_description: BOB Infant car seat adapter lets you transport your infant from car to BOB stroller while infant remain in the compatible Graco infant car seat. Fits Graco SnugRide(R) Classic Connect, SnugRide(R) 30, 32 and 35 Classic Connect infant car seats; will not fit SnugRide 35 or 40 with Click Connect. Easy to install, and remove and folds with the stroller; restraint belt secures infant car seat in place. Works with 2011 and newer single-child BOB strollers, including Revolution SE, Revolution CE, Stroller Strides, Sport Utility Stroller and Ironman models. Because of the higher center of gravity it creates, the BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter is intended for walking use only. BOB recommends that you consult with your pediatrician regarding the suitability of stroller use with your child as each child develops at a different rate.
short_description: BOB Infant car seat adapter lets you transport your infant from car to BOB stroller while infant remain in the compatible Graco infant car seat.
